title: Visual Brand Guidelines
subtitle: Create consistent visual identity
description: Upload images from your website, social media, or brand assets. We'll analyze them to create comprehensive visual guidelines.

upload.title: Upload Brand Images
upload.description: Add images that represent your brand

dropzone.prompt: Drag & drop images or click to browse
dropzone.supported: Supports JPG, PNG, WebP up to 10MB
dropzone.tips: Upload 3-5 high-quality images including logos, website screenshots, and product images

generation.title: Generate Test Images
generation.description: Create sample images based on your visual guidelines

loading.title: Analyzing visual elements...
loading.description: Extracting color palettes, lighting, and composition from your images

validation.atLeastOneImage: Please upload at least one image
validation.analysisFailed: Image analysis failed. Please try again.

analyzing.title: Analyzing Images... üîç
analyzing.description: Processing {{count}} image(s) with AI vision. This may take a minute.

analysisError.title: Analysis Error
analysisError.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

deleteFailed.title: Delete Failed
deleteFailed.description: Failed to delete image. Please try again.
